data.reason: TIER 1-style setup closely matching prior WON AAVE/POL pattern while avoiding LOST filters: BTC neutral, 4H/1H BUY, RSI 59.2 in 50–60 band, 24h gain +4.9% in 3–5% band, MACD bullish and not extended.
